entry.def: You can describe people and things as sexy if you think they are sexually exciting or sexually attractive.

example.ex: She was one of the sexiest women I had seen...
example.tran: 她是我见过的最性感的女人之一。

example.ex: It was a wonderful voice which women found incredibly sexy.
example.tran: 这美妙的嗓音令女人们觉得非常性感。
